name: ꜱᴀꜱᴜᴋᴇ ✘ ᴍᴜꜱɪᴄ
description: A Telegram Music Player Bot, written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

EXTRA_PLUGINS.description: if You want to load extra plugins with music plugins so fill True  if you don't want to load extra plugins so Fill False

MONGO_DB_URI.description: Get a mongodb url from https://cloud.mongodb.com. 𝐈𝐅 𝐘𝐎𝐔 𝐃𝐎𝐍𝐓 𝐇𝐀𝐕𝐄 𝐓𝐇𝐄𝐍 𝐔𝐒𝐄 𝐀𝐋𝐑𝐄𝐀𝐃𝐘 𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋𝐄𝐃 𝐌𝐎𝐍𝐆𝐎.

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user whom you would like to add as OWNER.

STRING_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram v2 String Session from @StringFatherBot on Telegram. .

AUTO_GCAST.description: 𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄:- [On/Off] 𝐅𝐎𝐑 On/Off 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐆𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓/𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄.

AUTO_GCAST_MSG.description: 𝐅𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄 𝐖𝐇𝐈𝐂𝐇 𝐖𝐈𝐋𝐋 𝐁𝐄 𝐀𝐔𝐓𝐎 𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓𝐄𝐃 𝐓𝐖𝐈𝐂𝐄 𝐈𝐍 𝐀 𝐃𝐀𝐘. ( 𝐀𝐍𝐘 𝐓𝐘𝐏𝐄 𝐎𝐅 𝐌𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐀𝐆𝐄 𝐘𝐎𝐔 𝐂𝐀𝐍 𝐂𝐎𝐏𝐘 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝐏𝐀𝐒𝐓𝐄 𝐇𝐄𝐑𝐄 )

LOGGER_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Channel ki id mat daal dena bsdk.
